state_description: This screen allows users to manage and optimize their Mac's performance by controlling launch agents and login items.

enables.name: Manage Launch Agents
enables.description: Stay in charge of the supporting applications on your Mac.

enables.name: Take Control of Login Items
enables.description: Manage all of your login items to run only what you truly need.

enables.name: View All Items
enables.description: View all 11 items related to optimization.
